actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey the mineral interest of the United States to Oklahoma State University to certain lands in Oklahoma.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey all mineral interests reserved to the United States in specified land to Oklahoma State University.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey the mineral interest of the United States to Oklahoma State University to certain lands in Oklahoma.
